routes.description: Will always return json with the text hello.
Will current time. Meant to test if Cloudflare or Vercel is caching the API routes.
Will output headers that were recieved from the server. Meant to see what headers Cloudflare and Vercel append.
The example on the vercel website for caching serverless functions. Caches the response and serves it fresh every 50 seconds.

A simple example returning the number of minutes past the hour and the number of seconds past the minute. The cache is fresh for 0-10 seconds; stale for 10-59 seconds, but served from the cache, and in the background is revalidated; completely stale after 60 seconds and must be fetched from the server.
